channel.title: Pixelated Peculiarities
channel.description: An absolute dumpster fire of a sprite comic

item.title: Commander Keen 3 Keen Must Die True Ending
item.description: This website isn't my first rodeo. Or my second. Or my third. I think it's probably my 6th or so? So let's talk about some internet history that surely nobody w...The Vorticons are dead and Commander Keen is happy. He is also a bit sad because he killed them.

item.title: Inspected Gadget and Kuzco the Emperor's New Groove Ride a Rollercoaster
item.description: Inspected Gadget and Kuzco the Emperor's New Groove ride a rollercoaster and they DO NOT die. They are both very happy.

item.title: Hewligg Urobokkle and the Mysterious Case of the Missing Pencil
item.description: Hewligg Urobokkle is a detective and he's trying to find a pencil but he can't find it because it's missing.

item.title: Mario and Luigi Drink England Juice
item.description: I'm here to make ironic sprite comics and drink England juice, and I'm all out of England juice.

item.title: Guybrush Threepwood and the Ordinary Rubber Chicken With a Pulley in the Middle of Th eK
item.description: Guybrush Threepwood finds a perfectly normal rurbber chicken with a pulley in the middle. OR DOES HE? (He does.) Oh, and there's a monkey. And a pirate. named LeChuck. And a ghost. nee nee noo noo

item.title: Alex Kidd's Whacky Wheelie Adventure
item.description: Alex Kidd drives a car and it's whacky and wheelie.

item.title: Gotta Grow Pasta
item.description: Knuckles the Echidna tries to punch Sonic but it doesn't work because he's too fast, so he grows pasta.

item.title: https://eatkin.neocities.org/comics/pages/comic_1
item.link: Sonic the Hedgehog in Chilli Dog Zone
item.description: Sonic the Hedgehog tells Commander Keen to have a chilli dog but finds out he doesn't know what they are, so they go to Chilli Dog Zone.
